articles.title: Drought-triggered leaf transcriptional responses disclose key molecular pathways underlying leaf water use efficiency in sugarcane (Saccharum spp.)
Danyel F. Contiliani1, 2, João Felipe C. de O. Nebo 3, Rafael V. Ribeiro4, Marcos G. de A. Landell2, Tiago C. Pereira1, 5, Ray Ming6, Antonio Figueira3 and …
A network-based framework for reanalysing public transcriptome data to identify key genes involved in water deficit response in sugarcane (Saccharum spp.)
